thread.title: South Africa's Zuma to quit if conditions met in deal with Ramaphosa - Times Live news

title: South Africa's Zuma to quit if conditions met in deal with Ramaphosa - Times Live news

organizations.name: ramaphosa - times live news reuters staff

text:
03 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago South Africa's Zuma to quit if conditions met in deal with Ramaphosa - Times Live news Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - South Africa’s Times Live online news service cited sources on Tuesday as saying President Jacob Zuma will resign as soon as a list of preconditions has been finalised in a deal struck with deputy president and African National Congress leader Cyril Ramaphosa. 
The ANC’s secretary-general, Ace Magashule, who attended a meeting between the two, would not confirm whether Zuma had agreed to resign, but other ANC leaders said a deal was struck that would see Zuma “go in a dignified way”, Times Live said. Reporting by James Macharia; Editing by Hugh Lawson
